website_summaries.verdict: This oversized bag fits the Britax Advocate – a high-end seat that other, pricier protection bags do not.
pros: Fits many major car seat brands
Large enough to hold Britax Advocate car seat
Bright handles make it stand out for easy identification
cons: Be sure to tie a double knot after sliding the locking mechanism shut, because the plastic piece may not hold well

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We traveled from Oregon to Honolulu and back. Held up great, very durable no rips or snags. I was worrying about it not being big enough to fit my daughters car seat it well When we received it my boyfriend and I were joking about how big the bag is and how we could just stuff me in there instead of getting me a plane ticket so he dared to me try and fit in there lol well I did! We were able to put her car seat and my oldest daughters booster seat in there as well...and yes, that’s me in the bag in the picture 😂
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear1994

customer_reviews.title: Withheld 4 airplane rides!!
customer_reviews.text: This was PERFECT!! Backpack style was easy to carry, it was a great size! It held our full size car seat plus booster seat. Clear labeling was wonderful! And the drawstring plus the flap over it made it super easy to use and kept everything protected! It's a must by when traveling by air!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for chicco and graco
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Used for one flight, no rips and there’s even a place to write your name on them. We bought two and it fit a graco4ever and a chicco keyfit 30 car seat with base. Love the straps and made it so easy to get moving around in the airport with two littles !
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Buy this ASAP!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we needed for our son’s Evenflo car seat. It is durable and lightweight. I traveled by myself with my son and was able to carry it on my back with ease. The straps don’t cut into your arms either. After the initial use my bag had a slight tear in the bag but the car seat was still undamaged. I contacted their amazing customer service team and they replaced my bag free of charge. Top notch product from a great company! I recommend purchasing this to cover your car seats for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Claw7

customer_reviews.title: Good tough material
customer_reviews.text: I settled on this car seat travel bag after reading lots of reviews. We checked our car seat at the check-in counter, and you can see they really handle luggage rough. After just 2 flights, the bag and straps are covered is black smears and you can see that a lesser fabric would have torn in areas. I don't know how many trips it will take, but it protected the car seat well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems Tough and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to try and protect our car seat on a flight for a family vacation. They material seems durable and the bag had plenty of room to get the car seat into. The backpack straps were nice to help get to and from the airport. I opted to check the car seat at the counter instead of the gate and after two flights the bag is still in great shape. It help up well for me so far. For the price I think it exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy It - Trust Me
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because we had 2 car seats to get from the car to baggage check and also had to get the car seats from the baggage check at our destination to the rental car shuttle and etc WHILE SHUFFLING KIDS!!! This did its job and more. We were not only able to fit one convertible carseat into the bag but we were also able to fit another Britax full back booster in the bag so we were surprised we were able to fit both in this large bag. Sure my husband looked ridiculous with this very large backpack of carseats but it made the trip shuffling so much better. This is a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dodd

customer_reviews.title: One trip down, and holding up like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our recent trip and was impressed with the quality for the price. We carried a convertible carseat and a toddler booster both inside this no problem. Both of those are lighter seats that we use for traveling, so I am not sure about how comfortable it would be carrying a heavy seat like a Britax. Its bulky to carry loaded with the seat and the booster, but wasn't super uncomfortable. Our trip wasn't direct flight so I was handled often by the airports, and survived with some minor scuffs. I was impressed with how well it held up. Would by again.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished our 1st trip with this bag: SO much easier to carry the car seat. Shoulder straps are comfortable to wear; other straps make it easy to grab the bag just about anywhere (e.g., for easy bag-claim retrieval). Withstood typical TSA handling well. Like the velcro flap at the top; you can tuck the long drawstrings into the bag & the flap will help keep them in, so they don't catch on anything else. Tons of room in the bag; can't imagine there's a seat out there that wouldn't fit. We were also able to easily slip a couple of additional items in the bag that we couldn't fit or had forgotten to put in our other checked bags.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag
customer_reviews.text: This car seat backpack worked very well for carrying it through the airport and holding up well. But I should tell you that I didn't realize the padded straps are not as big or padded as I thought and my husband hated carrying it. He said next time he would get a mechanism that has wheels to pull it around like luggage. But if price is important to you, this will do what you need and is definitely more cost-effective than a wheeled option.
customer_reviews.author: Mademoiselle

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product. I used it for a Evenflow Symphony ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. I used it for a Evenflow Symphony Convertible Car seat flying to Florida. Great quality, no rips or tears, and will definitely be going on another trip. It keeps the seat from getting beat up and dirty in the cargo hold. You can wear it like a backpack which keeps your hands free to hold on to your kid and other luggage minimizing the struggle factor. Definitely a Mom Approved product, worth every penny!!!!! Pro tip - if you are bringing a flotation device for your child - stick it in the bag with the car seat (they don't look) and it is free to check your car seat or stroller when flying.
customer_reviews.author: MAB

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat bags!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous car seat bags. I have held off on buying car seat bags for years, instead wrapping them in garbage bags. So ghetto but it works. I finally saw these at a great price and took the plunge. And now all I can think is WHY DID I WAIT SO LONG?! These are perfect. Backpack straps, various handles all over the bag. Drawstring to close and a velcro flap to cover the drawstring. Works great, we traveled recently with these and the bags still look fabulous afterwards! Very large too, we used ours for our enormous backed booster seats and they fit with plenty of room to spare. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hugginkiss

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this travel bag
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this travel bag. It’s very simple and not structured, but I had another travel bag that had more structure and it was very comfortable and not easy to move around the airport with. Another thing I liked about this bag is that it hasn’t ripped after one travel like the other bag I had. Like I said earlier, it’s a simple bag that has ample space to throw in a couple of travel cubes (if you use those to pack) or diapers and it’s easy to spot when getting my luggage.
customer_reviews.author: mariahdez

customer_reviews.title: Useful buy for travel
customer_reviews.text: I thought this car seat travel bag was pretty useful. We used it to carry our son’s seat through the airport. Pros: The bag opens and closes easily. Our car seat fit perfectly. You’re able to carry your car seat on your back, while leaving your hands free to carry other luggage. Cons: the bag is pretty big, which of course is to fit the car seat. However, if you’re short like myself... I wouldn’t personally use it on my own. It would just be way too big for me to carry on my back. Luckily, my husband carried it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver when it rained.
customer_reviews.text: We used it to protect the stroller and car seat when we handed them in at the gate. The bag is very spacious so most car seats will fit, no problem. When we landed and they brought the stoller and car seat up it was raining very hard. The bag was soakkng but to our surprise the carseat was dry. So happy we bought it even if it takes an extra minute to put the car seat kn the bag. It is a plus it has strong straps to carry by hand or on you back. The material is strong. K expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Erica J

customer_reviews.title: Strap/handle broke on second use. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this last year. We have used it twice and the strap broke already. We were not rough with it and literally used it twice. I wrote in to the manufacturer and haven’t heard anything back. I highly would not recommend at this point given the lack of customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done, I guess.
customer_reviews.text: So far this is way better than not using a bag. It helps to have the backpack straps. The only thing is that since it is made to fit all car seats, it is too big for ours. So, when I wear it as a backpack it doesn’t fit very well. It’s better than nothing, though, and it’s not falling apart yet, so that’s pretty good. We’ve had other brand ones that had seams rip, so hopefully this will continue to work. It would be nice if the straps were more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kerby

customer_reviews.title: Great price!! Great Product! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! We had two car seats to carry from East to West Coast and back for vacation. These bags were great! Super easy to use, carry, and check in for the plane. We even through a few extra things in the bag like blankets. My husband was able to carry one britax on the front of him and one on the back as well as pulling two luggage bags. The material is very well made! The only thing i would suggest is when you slide the locking mechanism shut you should tie a double knot as well, because the plastic piece doesn't hold as well as i had hoped. I highly recommend this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: NikkiLynn

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is really really useful. I live in city and don’t have a car. I do zip cars and other rental cars all the time. Biggest problem is carrying the heavy car seat up and down my Aparment building. With this it is so easy. I have stored the car seat in this bag and just carry it like a back pack. Quality is good also. It feels good and strong. You can also use it for carrying other big things. I didn’t even think of it before coming across this Overall recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Vinay Chowdhary

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bags!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two bags for our recent trip. They kept our booster seats safe and clean while traveling. We were even able to throw other items in the bag, like bulky jackets. My husband was very impressed with the design and durability. Our trip to Colorado we gate checked the bags. Our return trip we checked the bags. It was easy to spot the bags with the neon colored handles. The bags held up great! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: VB2CPK14

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!  Three Bags Withstood Four Flight Legs!
customer_reviews.text: We are quite pleased with this bag! It took a while to find one that, based on reviews, wouldn't shred into bits on the first use. We used three of these on a recent trip with four flight legs and they worked beautifully! They are constructed of heavy nylon that did not rip at all. They have a nice combination of straps so you can carry them like a backpack, over a single shoulder or as a suitcase. This was very handy for having to carry three cars seats along with the rest of the baggage. And lastly, they can be folded up into their own little zippered pouch when not in use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great features
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the ratings and price without paying too much attention to the product details. Once it arrived I was pleasantly surprised that in addition to the straps to carry it on your back there is also a single strap to carry it in your hand instead which is what I ended up doing because my diaper bag which I also had to carry is a back pack. I've used it once on an hour long flight to transport a Cosco 50 Apt. The car seat fit well in the bag and the bag was not damaged. Also, the storage bag is actually attached and not separate which is great so that you can't lose it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeela

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover For The Price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this car seat cover to replace the last one we had which had a few rips in it following 2 round trip flights. The shoulder pads on the cover for carrying it are fairly comfortable and the opening is large enough to be able to put the car seat in without difficulty. As far as durability goes we'll have to wait and see as it's only been on one trip so far but I'm hopeful it will do well. The only down side is putting it back into the carry bag is a bit tight.
customer_reviews.author: Nick G

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: One of the straps came twisted, and we couldn’t untwist it. That was disappointing. My husband was still able to wear/carry it with the shoulder straps, and it held up beautifully on our trip through the flights there and back. (It actually held one large all-in-one car seat for our 2-year-old and a smaller lightweight one for our four-year-old!) I bought another brand’s bag a couple of years ago which tore right away in handling. We are very happy with the product overall, just sorry about the defective strap.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: A friend recommended me this cover and the product is just great
customer_reviews.text: How I did not think about it before, that's what went through my mind after I ordered this to cover my daughter's car seat. On our last international flight, her car seat (Chico Nextfit) came back with scratches and some tears in the fabric. I promised myself that on her next flight I would be ready to wrap it up before we sent it again. A friend recommended me this cover and the product is just great! It kept her chair well, the straps are strong, the fabric durable and. Made of very high quality. I strongly recommend. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Heni

customer_reviews.title: Fits full-size car seat
customer_reviews.text: Just came back from an international flight using the travel bag and the bag and car seat arrived without damage. It was easy to fit our full-size Britax convertible car seat into the bag and wear as a backpack to the flight checkin counter. The car seat arrived on the belt with all the other luggage and everything was intact. I purchased the travel bag because I want my car seat protected from damage and I wanted it covered from all the germs and since I needed to put my toddler from flight to car seat. I’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JenCic

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Bought these being a little unsure if they'd hold up, as seemed like every other bag we looked at had people complaining they barely lasted through one trip. These held up fine for our trip and I don't see any reason they won't easily survive another. Surprisingly comfy to strap to your back, fit our large all-in-one car seats easily, close up tight with a cover flap to keep water and dirt out, have a nice large area to write your name and contact info on, fold back into attached carry bag for easy transport. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, great for travel
customer_reviews.text: this has been a great purchase. It has gone to Europe several times with us now and has made bringing car seats so much easier. folds to nothing. the design is great because all the ties are folded inside, keeps your car seats dry, and can be carried relatively easy on your back. We were carrying a front facing car seat and a booster. It durable and doesn't look like we've used it even though it has been on at least 5 long distance hauls.
customer_reviews.author: Mel1ssa

customer_reviews.title: Durable and the straps make traveling with carseats so easy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2, one for each carseat that we were traveling with. We only used them once (direct flight to and from) on our recent trip, but they held up very well in checked luggage. The straps were great so my husband and I could each have one on as a backpack, leaving our arms free, although the straps could have had a little more padding. The ties didn't come lose at all as some other reviewers mentioned...I just tied the strings in a knot to keep them snug. The zip pouch it comes in is attached too, so no worries about losing it, which is awesome for future storage. I'd highly recommend for anyone traveling with a carseat.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, nice qualify
customer_reviews.text: I get 2 bags to travel and specially to be hands free while carrying other items in the airports. The bag is pretty good and solid, I have only used once but those looks it will last. The small compartment to store them is very practical. The size is big, so you can esaly store an infant car seat, booster or other; I tried to place 2 seats and this fits, but I did not want to force it so I only used with 1 at the end. I will recommend this for anyone who wants to carry their seat as a bag pack (a big one ;) ) and have it protected from dust or rain.
customer_reviews.author: GTL

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof. Quality so-so, but wasn't expecting a pelican case
customer_reviews.text: -Claims water proof, but not even water resistant. Got home and car seat was soaking wet. Not fun after a 4 hour flight with a 2 month old. -drawstrings are harder to get tight than they should be. My wife couldn't even get them so we had to swap tasks as we were trying to board. -stitching starting to come off at Velcro (only used 1 trip). Get what
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Traveled well, wore as a backpack easily :)
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my Chicco Keyfit 30+ a base. Fit nicely, I also put a bag with diapers and wipes for a weekend in with it. The straps were great for backpack carry. I like that the storage pouch is connected so i won’t have to keep track of it, it is a toght fit to re-pack into the storage pouch, though. This kept the carseat clean and dry on a very rainy travel day at both departing and arriving airports. The bag made it with no damage and It’ll also fit our next carseat when baby outgrows the keyfit.
customer_reviews.author: Jason and Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Great Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Best travel purchase in a while! Definitely easier with two people to hold the bag and load/unload the car seat. Easy to carry and comfortable to carry. I’m always worried about how airlines will treat car seats and expected the bag to be ripped or damaged once we picked up our checked luggage. And it survived without any issues! Great buy! Since my child is large enough to fit in a high back booster we could have probably fit two boosters in the bag. But would only recommend one car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat travel bag. Easy to use and it provides good protection for our car seat. It's not too bulky. We've only used it twice so far, that's why I'm only giving it 4 stars for durability. Hopefully, it will hold up well for multiple trips. Although I love the reversible pouch it comes with, I wish it was a little easier to fold and fit back into the pouch. A very minor inconvenience, otherwise it's a great travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I found this. We used this a florida trip. Our carseat is 31lbs so it put the straps to a test. It held up great! And amazingly enough I have refolded it and put it back in it's attached pouch 3x with ease. Will be great for our trip next year. Most others I looked at basically were a one use thing because they don't hold up. This is well worth the little bit added cost and was still on the cheaper end of others I looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Stood out, durable.
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time last night. it worked great and fit over my huge carseat. very convenient with the backpack straps. I love that it has the neon green accents because all the other car seat bags were plain black and this one stood out! I knew which one was mine. it is a little difficult to get exactly back into the bag and zip close but I am also terrible at doing that kinda thing. overall great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nelle

customer_reviews.title: Overall I’m impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’m honestly very pleased with the car seat carrier. I read all the reviews and saw that some fell apart during the travel but decided to get it anyway. It comes folded in a small pouch which is so hard to get back into, but it fit my daughter 5-30 pounds car seat and base perfectly. The only thing I noticed after getting home (4 flights total) where a few little holes not even the size of my pinky nail. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a convertable car seat
customer_reviews.text: We were pleased. Straps were sturdy, and drawstring was good quality. Bag was large enough to fit our grow and go car seat plus when our suitcase was overweight, we took a few items of clothes out of the suitcase and put it in this bag with the car seat. Nothing was misplaced as the bag stayed closed when we tightened it. The bag is great quality and the material is thick. folds up into an attached bag that zips shut. There is a space to write your name on the bag with a sharpie and the bag kept the seat clean and undamaged during travel. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zahavah F.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I love how roomy these hinges are. I have the infant car seat and stroller combo and I had a lot of room left in these cover bags. Definitely see how people could add the diaper bag and few other things inside. Made one round trip with the seat cover and stroller cover and they both worked well. I did do gate check for these though. I can’t say how long they’d last if they’re checked with regular luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best! Second one i bought bc unfortunately I lost ...
customer_reviews.text: The best! Second one i bought bc unfortunately I lost my last one. It can fit a whole travel system, or now that my child is older it fits a toddler size car seat and carseat transporter. It is a great material, super durable, color keeps clean, and bright green handles to see it right away that are super sturdy as well. And folds into a small little pouch super easily for before and after use.
customer_reviews.author: uenderson

customer_reviews.title: Straps are uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: If you just want something to keep your car seat from getting dirty than this is fine. If you’re trying to walk around with your child’s car seat comfortably on your back through the airport then forget it. The straps are not comfortable and dig through your shoulders. Could not get the straps small enough to fit my petite 5’4” frame. Spend the $6 or so to rent an airport pushcart.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a good travel bag to protect our expensive carseat, and this did the trick. It was roomy enough to fit both the carseat and base. I know it doesn't have any padding, but the bag was so roomy that we could have fit some towels in there if we really wanted to. It was relatively easy to fold back up once I had some time to do it (did a little test run before our trip, so we wouldn't be in a frenzy trying to get that thing put away). It's a good buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Chung

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag but doesn't close all the way
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag and seems high quality for the money although I've only taken it on one trip so not sure how it will do over the long-term yet. Only complaint is that the draw string design results in a small gap in the bag where theoretically small parts could fall out of the bag. There is a velcro flap that goes over it but still not totally tight.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Durable spacious car seat bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag held up great on our flight from Rhode Island to Florida. We put our car seat (Graco 3 in 1) in it and our extra stroller seat from our baby jogger city select double stroller and checked it curbside. We were so happy with it. And when you aren’t using it, it’s easy to fold up and throw in another bag. It is very durable and great for traveling with a car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great travel concept.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was made of thicker material. We have travelled round trip twice with this bag, and so far it has held up. We have a britax clickit carseat. This bag is definitely a saver specially when you travel while it's raining. It kept our carseat dry and scuff free. Carrying the carseat in backpack mode is pretty hard since most carseats weight over 10lbs. But if you have good upper body strength then this should be a piece of cake. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gauri

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible! No regrets.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied! Recently traveled for the first time with a car seat. I honestly don’t know what I would have done without this. In our most recent flight, our expensive suitcase was ripped and severely damaged, yet our inexpensive car seat cover was unscathed! While a car seat is inescapably difficult to travel with, this travel case made it easy and relatively comfortable to carry. The seat was pretty easy to get in and out - though it’s much easier with two people than one. When you aren’t using the cover, it folds up really easily into itself and stays put. This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I can only speak for one round-trip flight(s). I was flying alone with my one year-old and the straps were so handy when I had to push a stroller, push my check bag, AND throw his HUGE rear facing car seat on my back in order to walk from the airport to the car rental station (which is fairly far at the Austin airport). Had there not been any straps, I don’t know what I would’ve done. No holes after the trip. Definitely worth saving your expensive car seat from scratches and germs.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Daw

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: We used these (stroller bag + 2 car seat bags) on a family vacation. They lasted our four flights without more than a cosmetic scuff. The straps were nice for carrying when needed and the line green color was easy to spot on the luggage carousel. The drawstrings tuck inside neatly with a large Velcro flap for extra security. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: So helpful! Should have purchased these with our first child.
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought these 2 years previous. We do a lot of traveling with our toddlers and their car seats have always been put in garbage bags which did absolutely nothing during air travel. Car seats always came back banged up and torn. These car seat travel bags not only save the car seats on wear and tear but also make it so much easier for carrying the car seats in and out of the airports. Solved a lot of problems!! Can also slip in extra small bags into the car seat bags without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We just got back from a trip. I was reluctant to check the car seat because I wasn’t sure if the bag’s durability. In the end, I did. Even though it has should straps, it’s still uncomfortable to carry. It held up well through being checked. No damage or rips. For $25ish, it was a great buy for the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was a lifesaver. I traveled with three kids, which is an ordeal! I’m a woman and I had no problems carrying the car seat on my back. It also held up nice after being checked in 2 times. No rips or tears.
customer_reviews.author: LouLou1355

customer_reviews.title: Love this travel bag!
customer_reviews.text: We used it extensively on our recent trip. Held up great through bag check for the flights. We didn't rent a car as parking fees were ridiculous and just ubered when needed. Very easy to store the car seat in the bag and carry it around. The places we visited had lockers or guest services to store it so we didn't to bring it along during the visits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t got a chance to use this for travel yet but it seems like it’s great. Love the straps and closure etc. The only “complaint” I have is there is NO WAY I can get that bag back into the carry bag they send with it. I wish it was its own separate bag and not built in. Not a huge deal for me though. Also love that it has a big spot for your name
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Useful bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag worked great for our recent trip. The straps making it a backpack are very helpful. It held up well and was able to fold up when not in use. The bag is large enough to fit a variety of car seats. That does make it a little cumbersome to get the car seat into the bag due to extra material. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bunk64

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I haven’t gotten to travel with this bag yet but it fit perfectly over my Britax car seat. I even bought a second one for my Britax B Agile stroller. That’s how big it is! The material seems pretty durable and the pouch is fold into is really convenient. I will update my review once we return from our trip to see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: We used these on a trip from Florida to California with our three year old and one year old who ride in Evenflo Sureride car seats. We did check the car seats with our luggage rather than at the gate but these kept the car seats from getting dirty on the trip. They also made it manageable to get all of our luggage from the shuttle to the check in with two small children in tow. I was able to put diapers in each bag too so I wouldn’t have to waste space with our checked bag. Overall I’m really glad we purchased these and will definitely be using them again on future trips.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our summer trip to NYC and the bag was perfect. Good quality and it stood out at baggage claim for its neon accent stitching and handles. This fit our Maxi Cosi convertible carpet just well and made transport for my husband so easy due to the straps for carrying. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Southernmama

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag for gate checker car seats
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly and exactly as pictured and described. We used it for a flight with our large convertible Graco car seat. No trouble getting it through security at DFW airport, gate checked it for free on American Airlines. Bag held up great. Shoulder straps were helpful walking through the terminal and to the rental car counter. And - much to my amazement - we were able to fold the bag up into its very small built-in storage bag... not as neat and fancy as the picture, but it fit.
customer_reviews.author: SkiBreck

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I traveled alone with 2 year old twins, their carseats, our bags, and still had my sanity afterwards. These bags were lifesavers getting the carseats from the car to check in and then back home. I don't know what I would have done without them. They had a few options for carrying: backpack straps, and a longer over the shoulder one. The carseats were in perfect condition after both flights.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Marsch

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: In the past I had used travel bags for carseats that didn't have shoulder straps. The car seat would constantly fall off my rolling suitcase, and made the trip into/and out of airports miserable. These bags are the best! I can now put the carseat on my back, and easily pull 2 suitcases, and avoid the bruises and frustration of the carseat hitting me in the legs every time I'm traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Ap50031

customer_reviews.title: Lasted through six airports/airplanes in 7 days
customer_reviews.text: Our brand new luggage has shown more wear than this car seat bag. It looks like it can last going through another 7 more airports/airplanes. The opening is pretty big and was was not difficult with taking the child seat in and out of it. The bag has a built in pouch to store the bag when not in use. I would purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Recommended, and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Used two of these to go from Kansas to New York. had a layover for a few hours and then continued on to finish my trip in New York. The straps at the back make it easy to carry. It was very convenient to have these instead of just trying to put them in as a tagged item. I will recommend this to all of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: We only used it once so far but it's still in great condition. I love the straps so I can wear it like a backpack. I'm 5'1" and still could carry it on my back with the car seat in it. I also love that it can be compact. We don't bust it out until we are in line at the gate. This bag is huge. With our Chicco keyfit 30, there's still plenty of room left.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Its functional but cumbersome to carry
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our first trip with our 3mth old. The bag held up well however is very cumbersome to tote around the airport on your back. The bag is large enough to hold a Britax carseat and we included a "sit me up" with it in the bag for our little one to use on the trip. The strings held up and didn't tear. Bag held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Reynolette Ettienne

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Did the job. We took this bag to protect our car seat through the airports of: Nevada-Korea-Philippines and back. We even packed a few extra items in it. No rips, still in great condition. It is now folded away in its little carry pouch until our next trip. The only thing that was a little concerning is that the flap to close the opening is velcro. It has a drawstring closure that is easy to secure followed by a velcro flap. Although, at each destination's baggage claim, the flap never opened. I would still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sumadeez

customer_reviews.title: Saved my car seat!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this car seat travel bag for a recent trip. Love it!! One of the Best Buy’s I have ever made. The flight home had torrential rains. All my luggage was soaked and had grease scuff marks. The bag saved my car seat. The car seat stayed dry and clean. The bag held up with no damage. The back pack feature made carrying it while dragging luggage and walking a 2 year old so much easier. I cannot say enough about the quality of this bag! I would buy again and highly recommend to anyone traveling with a car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Roxane McEuen

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to baggage luggage check in.
customer_reviews.text: This car seat cover fits my infant car seat with base no problem! I love that's it is lightweight yet holds up to travel and checkin. I can see myself using this for my son's booster seat when the time comes. It's not as easy to fold up as I thought it would be. I have to place it down and fold in. I can't just roll it up. But other than that its an awesome deal! Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Was a lifesaver for hauling an awkward car seat from coast to coast!
customer_reviews.text: Have taken this on multiple flights this summer and it was great. Hauling a car seat around is so awkward but this bag sure assists in the process. I checked it at the gate on my first flight due to the multiple reviews about durability but it was a pain taking the seat out to get through security so checked it at the curb for the next 3 flights and it held up great! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our first trip w/car seat. It worked great, it was sturdy and large enough to fit our car seat. I like the added straps so you can carry it like a backpack. You can definitely stuff additional stuff in it just not anything valuable because its easy to open and not secure for valuable stuff. But glad I purchased and it also folds back up nicely in a compact pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: "Super handy. I rented a car seat and realized it was a waste of money since it was 110 for the week. Bought a great lightweight evenflo chase carseat (9lbs) and this along with it. Made my life a breeze when traveling to LA. SOOO much room I ended up stuffing other things in it as well."
customer_reviews.author: Charles S.

customer_reviews.title: Large but surprisingly easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: So far we have made three trips with this bag. It is way too big for our infant car seat, but surprisingly that didn’t affect its use as a backpack: it actually carries really well, and I can easily drag two additional suitcases behind me while this thing is on my back. An advantage of the large size is that it will carry larger car seats (or even multiple car seats) in the future. Also, right now I can totally sneak an extra bag in there without the airline noticing 😊
customer_reviews.author: tugce isik

customer_reviews.title: Durable bag with bright straps for carseat
customer_reviews.text: We used this travel bag to fit my toddler's Graco Slimfit carseat while traveling. We had no problems packing up the carseat and the after one round trip through the airport the bag still looks brand new. I love the durable straps for carrying it as a backpack and the bright green colored straps make it very easy to find at baggage claim. Although it doesn't have any added padding to protect the carseat, it has plenty of space to add some diapers for insulation.
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful & Easily Fits Larger Carseat
customer_reviews.text: This was very helpful when we had to travel with a car seat for my almost 2-year-old (Graco Extend2Fit). I had concerns about it fitting easily, but it wasn't a problem. It almost could be smaller to stay closer onto my back when walking with it (but you get used to it). Definitely recommend if you want to travel with a car seat through an airport, or really if you're transporting it anywhere you'd need to carry it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: jbacon84

customer_reviews.title: Big fans!
customer_reviews.text: We love this! Bought two and happily traveled multiple legs with two lightweight car seats. Backpack straps are clutch and leave hands free for luggage and kids. Fabric thickness is good and should last well unlike our other car seat bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sam&Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fit 2, just in case you were wondering
customer_reviews.text: On our last trip we had a KeyFit and NextFit car seat inside the bag (yes, American Airlines was kind enough to allow this and count as 1 item at the counter). As my review with the VolkGo Durable Stroller Bag, my only complain are the padded straps that are too short to be functional.
customer_reviews.author: ekuapa

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps the airlines are too rough with the strollers. Similar to another bag I had previously, I've learned to accept that they're not meant for multiple use due to the fact that it's thin nylon and airport folks can be rough with people's personal effects.
customer_reviews.author: WeLikeAmazonPrime

customer_reviews.title: Nice to be able to take your boosters with you.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! We took it on one trip so far and it was very durable and nice to have with two kids still in booster seats. We fit both booster seats with backs and it fit great. We luggage checked it and it held up wonderful. Then when not using it it folds into a very small bag. Hopefully will last 5 more years.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, not as fragile as some reviews might suggest
customer_reviews.text: Very useful, not as fragile as some reviews might suggest. We've taken this on 8 flights now, it's holding up well The top closure could be a little better, especially to help you close it up fast on the airplane gangway Also as we're still using it for an infant car seat, there could be some straps that tighten the fit But this is worth buying
customer_reviews.author: Gammydodger

customer_reviews.title: Good enough!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fit tons of extra stuff. Have flown twice with it. Would be nice if it had stronger velcro for top cover but luckily stays closed with drawstring top. Not super durable material or easy to use straps or comfortable position but honestly how comfortable are you going to be with an awkward 50 lbs on your back while trying to wrangle a toddler in an airport. Pro tip- if you will not be traveling with another adult and have a carseat and a 2yo, consider paying extra to rent carseat with rental car and put 2 yo in harness (leash). Yep, leash.. go ahead and fight me. I dont give a crap.
customer_reviews.author: JOANNE KATHLEEN JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Held up during travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for recent travel and put my Doona in it. It held up well while protecting my carseat. When I saw it, I knew I would never be able to fold it back into the pouch configuration it came in, but that was no bother.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travelling with car seats!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of these. Makes it easy to bring the car seats along. Very durable and not only the comfortable backpack straps but also handles for grabbing quickly if you don't want to use as a backpack. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SM92109

customer_reviews.title: Smart and sturdy product!
customer_reviews.text: Just traveled across the country and back. This cover made it easy to transport the car seat without the car seat getting destroyed. Also made it easier to carry as traveling with the little guy requires much more luggage. Really liked the easy and size of the connected storage pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for us!
customer_reviews.text: Best idea ever! Whom ever made this knows what it is to travel with a small child and the hassles that come with the extra luggage. This makes it so much easier to carry your child's car seat and is protected from dirt and whatever stuff goes on when they are loading it on a plane.
customer_reviews.author: EMA

customer_reviews.title: Trains planes and automobiles!!!
customer_reviews.text: Literally travelled through airports,subways, ubers, boat taxis, buses, trains and walked through SF and Boston with this strapped to my back and husband’s back. Wish it was a little more comfy, but you’re schlepping a bulky thing on your back afterall. For the price it did the trick! And when we were waiting to get on any of these vehicles for travel, we would take the car seat pack off our back and use it as a little seat for our son. Great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Byrdie

customer_reviews.title: Useful gate check bag for carseat
customer_reviews.text: This car seat travel bag worked great! I had to travel with my 3 year old son by myself and this was very helpful while having to look after my son and carry other bags throughout the airport. You can hold this by hand, arm, over the shoulder, or like a backpack. If you’re planning to fly with a car seat, I highly recommend buying this so you can easily gate check it.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed to help me maneuver through the ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to help me maneuver through the airport with my 4 year old and 6 month old. Put my 4 year old's carseat on my back and was able to have my hands free instead to do other things. Bag held up well through travel.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Holds multiple seats!
customer_reviews.text: This is AWESOME!!! We flew with an infant carrier and base as well as a Booster with armrests and it held both PLUS some, because on our way back one suitcase was overweight and I threw a bunch of shoes in there too! If you fly, you need this! I already tested it with our convertible seat and booster for this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M

customer_reviews.title: Quality carseat bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality car seat bag for travel. We’ve only used it for a handful of flights, but so far so good. The backpack straps make it easy to carry two car seats at a time - one on the front and one one the back - while pulling luggage or pushing kids in a stroller. We would purchase this bag again.
customer_reviews.author: Teach

customer_reviews.title: Serves it’s purpose
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for an upcoming trip. It was big enough to put two cosco scenera next car seats in it fairly easily. The straps could be a little more comfortable but I’m not planning on carrying the seats long distances so it will do it’s job.
customer_reviews.author: M. Edmunds

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot talk about how great the quality is and how happy we are that we bought this! I am a very picky buyer and I always find something wrong with things that make me regret buying them, even simple things. But this bag? No regrets. IF this bag holds up, I’m keeping it until I can pass it on to my kids for their kids.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisGuam671

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t rip
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a chicco nextfit seat, didn’t rip like the other brands we used and the back pack style straps made it easy enough to carry for a short distance. So far has made it through 4 flights without damage.
customer_reviews.author: I P Freeley

customer_reviews.title: Why would anyone need anything more than this?
customer_reviews.text: It's a bag for a car seat. It is well made, has a handle and backpack straps and offers plenty of room. It also packs out of the way when not in use. I can't imagine needing more for travel. We used it for a recent trip to Florida. My wife was able to use the bag as a backpack and manage the toddler while I wrangled the rest of the gear. We also purchased an inexpensive and lightweight Cosco car seat prior to the trip... this was the perfect combo.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for our car seats to check them at the counter. They made it to our destination and back without an issue. Very well made. The bags held up great for me. I flew alone with my kids and had to lug them all around, along with all my stuff, so they were put through a beating.. love them and so glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Schlegel

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver. On the trip to pick my grandchildren up I used a car seat strap. That did not work out at all so I purchased this backpack for the flight back. It made a huge difference. I used it for the Cosco Scenera Next car seat. 1000% more useful that the strap.
customer_reviews.author: A rose is a rose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we were looking for!! Our Graco Forever car seat fit with plenty of room and the back straps made hauling it through the airports soooo much easier!!! I’m so happy with this purchase. And it was surprisingly easy to fold it back up once we made it to the car. It seemed to hold up well over this trip and I hope it lasts for a long while.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Worked great during my trip
customer_reviews.text: If you need this for a flight somewhere and you do not fly often I highly suggest it. Its just a bag, does not take up too much space and is perfect to keep your child's car seat clean and free from scuffs. There are is no padding for your back so if you really need that or travel often then this might not be the right product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Get these Bags!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs! The bag is still in great condition after 2 flights. No damages to the car seat, no rips in the bag. The bag is easy to carry with the straps (I think the flight crew liked the straps too! I saw them use it on their backs while carrying other strollers without bags). I loved that the bag comes in a small pouch and is easy to put it back in the pouch! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kal C

customer_reviews.title: Car Seat can still get Wet with top closed.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this bag twice while traveling from California to New York. It holds our baby car seat well and has held up with abuse. My one complaint would be that the bag cannot be sealed. It has a drawstring opening and then a velcro top that covers the opening. After one trip, the car seat was wet and the top of the travel bag was still intact.
customer_reviews.author: BlueJF

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store & easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use for travel and pack into a small bag within itself for easy storage. We bought one a few years ago for my daughter’s car seat and it still looks as new as the one we just bought for my son’s car seat. And we stuff them full when we check them in at the airport! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gatorbelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car seat travel bag.
customer_reviews.text: So this company is awesome a part of the bag was broken by the tsa and they replaced it at a very low cost. This bag has been all over with us even over seas and is still holding up like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Pleasant pumpkin

product_meta.title: VolkGo Durable Car Seat Travel Bag with E-Book –– Ideal Gate Check Bag for Air Travel & Saving Money –– for Safe & Secure Car Seat –– Fits Car Seats, Infant Carriers & Booster
feature_bullets: EASY TRAVEL WITH CAR SEAT – VolkGo Car Seat Bag makes it extremely easy to carry a baby car seat along with you even when traveling. With our car seat bag for air travel, you can Gate Check the bag & SAVE MONEY!

HASSLE-FREE & FUNCTIONALLY EFFECTIVE DESIGN – the gate check bag for car seats comes with 2 padded backpack straps help keep your hands free such that you can easily show tickets, hold your baby or even sip a cup of coffee at the airport.
WIDE COMPATIBILITY – it comes in 34 x 18 x 18 inch size which can easily accommodate almost all major brands car seats.
SUPERIOR QUALITY DESIGN– car seat accessory made up of highly DURABLE NYLON which is water-resistant and is stitched using state of the art technology – offers complete wear and tear protection.

IMPROVED SAFETY – this car seat check bag provides protection to toddler or infant car seat against dirt in airport terminals & in turn, helps keep your baby healthy & safe. So ORDER NOW and receive in a follow-up email an Exclusive E-BOOK (Bedtime story).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,340 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
